meanings.definition: A type of fastener with two metal wings that can be easily tightened and loosened by hand.
meanings.sent1: I used wingnuts to secure the shelves in my garage.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic tightened the wingnuts on the bicycle tire.
meanings.sent3: I saw a squirrel trying to use wingnuts to fix its nest.
meanings.sent4: The idea of using wingnuts to hold a friendship together seemed strange.
meanings.sent5: The shiny wingnuts gleamed in the sunlight, catching my eye.

meanings.definition: A person who holds extreme or unconventional political beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The rally was filled with wingnuts shouting slogans.
meanings.sent2: She always argues with her uncle, who is a real wingnut.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly called my friend a wingnut for wanting to ban pizza.
meanings.sent4: In the world of politics, the wingnuts stand out like bright stars.
meanings.sent5: The town hall meeting was chaotic, with various wingnuts voicing their opinions.
